sense.def:
Kadar nekdo
stabs someone
, nekomu zarine nož v telo.

seg.quote: A man was stabbed to death as he left a London library.

sense.def:
To stab something
ali
to stab at something
pomeni v nekaj suniti s prstom ali koničastim predmetom.

seg.quote: He stabbed the air with his index finger.
She was typing in a fury, her fingers stabbing at the keys.

sense.def:
To have a stab at something
pomeni nekaj poskusiti narediti;

seg.quote: I'd like to have a stab at tap dancing.
Kitty felt a stab of dismay.
